rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a small reception area and storage.
Open living space with Vastu-compliant east-west alignment for positive energy flow. Features an integrated dining area adjacent to the living room.
Dedicated dining space with ample seating and proximity to the kitchen.
Fully equipped modern kitchen designed for joint family usage with an open concept layout. Includes storage and a prep area that connects to the dining space.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a West-facing balcony for relaxation, designed with Vastu principles ensuring calm and balance. Adjacent to an en-suite bathroom.
En-suite bathroom to the master bedroom, with Vastu-aligned fixtures for optimal energy flow.
Additional bedroom for joint family members with a spacious West-facing balcony ensuring comfort and ventilation.
Another additional bedroom equipped with an adjoining balcony to meet the requirements of a joint family lifestyle.
A dedicated study area designed for work or leisure with natural light and a view towards the front entrance.
Multipurpose space that can serve as a guest room or entertainment area. Designed to be flexible in use for joint family events.

openings.description: Vastu-aligned main entry door on the east side of the facade, allowing positive energy flow into the home.
Spacious balcony adjoining the master bedroom providing a serene outdoor space with optimal ventilation.
Large balcony for additional bedroom ensuring ample natural light and privacy.
Additional balcony for the second extra bedroom, designed in accordance with Vastu principles for balanced energy.
